solution_line_template: If Yola currently weighs {yola_current} pounds, then Wanda, who weighs {wanda_more_than_yola} pounds more than Yola, weighs {yola_current}+{wanda_more_than_yola} = <<{yola_current}+{wanda_more_than_yola}={wanda_current}>>{wanda_current} pounds.

Wanda also weighs {wanda_more_than_yola_2yrs_ago} pounds more than Yola did 2 years ago, meaning Yola weighed {wanda_current}-{wanda_more_than_yola_2yrs_ago}=<<{wanda_current}-{wanda_more_than_yola_2yrs_ago}={yola_2yrs_ago}>>{yola_2yrs_ago} pounds 2 years ago.
